title: Ocean's Echo
author: Richard Powers
description: An immersive novel exploring human consciousness.

title: Lessons in Chemistry
author: Bonnie Garmus
description: A captivating story of a female scientist in the 1960s.

title: The Dawn of Everything
author: David Graeber, David Wengrow
description: A new history of humanity.

title: Empire of Pain
author: Patrick Radden Keefe
description: The secret history of the Sackler dynasty.

title: The Maid
author: Nita Prose
description: A charmingly eccentric hotel maid becomes embroiled in a murder investigation.

title: The Paris Apartment
author: Lucy Foley
description: A thrilling mystery set in a Paris apartment building.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster.

title: Leviathan Falls
author: James S.A. Corey
description: The final book in the Expanse series.

title: The Storyteller
author: Dave Grohl
description: The life story of the legendary musician and Foo Fighters frontman.

title: Greenlights
author: Matthew McConaughey
description: A memoir filled with raucous stories, outlaw wisdom, and lessons learned the hard way.

title: The Lincoln Highway
author: Amor Towles
description: A novel set in the 1950s, following four young men on a journey from Nebraska to New York.

title: Cloud Cuckoo Land
author: Anthony Doerr
description: A tale weaving through past, present, and future, exploring human connection.

title: Beautiful World, Where Are You
author: Sally Rooney
description: A story about relationships, friendships, and the dialogues we have within ourselves.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: An insightful guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

title: The Body Keeps the Score
author: Bessel van der Kolk
description: A revolutionary look at the science of trauma and pathways to healing.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A masterpiece of science fiction that explores politics, religion, and power.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: The former First Lady's memoir, a work of deep reflection and mesmerizing storytelling.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir of a young woman who leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A poignant tale of murder, mystery, and a young woman's connection with nature.

title: The Four Winds
author: Kristin Hannah
description: A powerful American epic about love and heroism during the Great Depression.
